module.name: system.uitypes
module.short: Delphi compatibility unit with GUI and image-related types.
module.descr: The System.UITypes unit contains UI (User Interface) related types: colors, cursor shapes, modal dialog results. These types have been isolated so they can be used in programs that need them without the need for including a specific UI framework.

element.name: TColor
element.short: Cardinal range type used to represent color values.

descr.p: TColor is a Cardinal type used to represent color values, and must be in the range -$7FFFFFFF-1..$7FFFFFFF. Each of the bytes in the Cardinal value represent a color component like Red, Green, and Blue - in that byte order.

The high order byte in the Cardinal value is reserved for use as the Alpha channel (transparency), with the high order bit reserved for use by the platform or operating system. TColor values do not include an Alpha channel component.
Use TColorRec to access constants with common names for the TColor values.

element.name: PColor
element.short: Pointer to a TColor type.

element.name: TColorRef
element.short: Provides access to the value for a color as a Cardinal type.

element.name: PColorRef
element.short: Pointer to a TColorRef type.

element.name: PAlphaColor
element.short: Pointer to a TAlphaColor type.

element.name: TColorRec
element.short: Record type used to access color names and values.

descr.p: TColorRec is a variant record type.
TColorRec includes constants representing common color names, including:

ul.li: Extended color names (as used in the Lazarus graphic unit).
Color aliases for LtGray (like clSilver) and DkGray (like clGray).

element.name: TColorRec.R
element.short: Byte representing the Red component in a color value.

element.name: TColorRec.G
element.short: Byte representing the Green component in a color value.

element.name: TColorRec.B
element.short: Byte representing the Blue component in a color value.

element.name: TColorRec.A
element.short: Byte representing the Alpha Channel or Transparency in a TColor value.

element.name: TColorRec.Color
element.short: TColor value for a given color.

element.name: TColorRec operator :=(AColor: TColor): TColorRec
element.short: Assignment operator which accepts a TColor value.

element.name: TColorRec operator :=(AColor: TColorRec): TColor
element.short: Assignment operator which accepts a TColorRec instance.

element.name: TColors
element.short: Alias for the TColorRec type.

element.name: ModalResultStr
element.short: An indexed array of strings representing the modal result constants.

descr.p: ModalResultStr is an array with ShortString values for each of the Integer modal result constants in the range mrNone..mrLast. Values in ModalResultStr can be accessed using the modal result constant to get the string at the corresponding ordinal position in the array.
